channel.title: Need help with adding commands
channel.description:
hey guys,
well i got two commands, which are ::say and ::summonall. I had both of these on a mess around easyrsc server that i was coding and i am trying to add them to my new server i am making, which is a rscd v25 base. I keep getting compiling errors when adding those commands, and i think it has to deal with adding something to my world.java, but i am not too sure what to add. Can someone fill me in on what to add and where? Very much appreciated thanks guy.

Pandemicpk:

thanks so much yong, solved

item.title: Need help with adding commands
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

Pandemicpk:

where do i add that stuff into?

Into your CommandHandler class. You can tell as it states:

symbol : variable lastplayer // Missing the declaration for 'lastplayer' location : class org.rscdaemon.server.packethandler.client.CommandHandler // Given class where the declaration should be found

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with adding commands
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

You need to define the things it is stating, lasttime, etc. You also need to import the Iterator class.

	String lastplayer;
	public long lasttime;
	public long lastmessage;

And the import:

import java.util.Iterator;

Read full topic
